name: Punchmade Dev
description:
'''Devon Isaak Turner''' (born October 16, 2000), better known professionally by his [[stage name]] '''Punchmade Dev''', is an American rapper and songwriter based in [[Lexington, Kentucky]]. Best known for the popularization of [[scam rap]], a sub-genre of [[hip hop]], he has produced various songs and videos relating to fraud, such as a "[[Wire fraud|Wire Fraud]] Tutorial", "Internet Swiping", and "Million Dollar Criminal" which have obtained several million views on [[social media platforms]].

In the earlier phase of his career, Turner performed under the monikers DevTakeFlight, and OBN Dev.
